price: Dhe mos adhuroni zot tjetër krahas Allahut, se unë vërtet që jam dërguar te ju prej Tij, si paralajmërues i qartë!”
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿalū maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
